divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking back from the store & turned from the main street to the smaller one , ay that time there was nothing in the sky , & as I've turned the corner there on the lawn of the property at about 1 step from me was a a round flat toy & on it it was printed"flying disc" , & I kind a laughed out loud thinking ' ah , a sign I'll see them now" ? I looked up , nothing 10 steps forward & there it was high to the left blinking pure white light than blink off & so on , obviously in a gliding motion from S to N line , needless to say I thought "thanks guys & the humor too" , I thought it was cute . I was in a steady slowed pace & didn't stop this time . Than the darkened tree branch & its foillege got in to my view obscuring the flushing lights . As I quickened past the tree I saw it last time blink than dark & than I couldn't see it anymore as I turned again & the large condo blocked it . When I got to the lightened area (security lights) I checked my watch & it was 11:05 plus some seconds . I did made sure if I'd still see it in the distance somewhere later but no . At home I was by the window 10-15 min later & saw a plane going same direction more or less but that one was human made .
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There was one other sighting in Toronto on or around July 11th 2010
